name: JR PrintServer
short_description:
Please note that the JR PrintServer is currently in first productive release status. Further development is still in progress. Improvements are being implemented.
Therefore minor changes in behavior are possible (and likely).
For documentation and some tips & tricks take a look a the Wiki pages.
You may also start a Discussion to get some additional hints.
summary: Integration of JasperReports into Oracle APEX and PL/SQL
